levels.name: Mirrors Intro
levels.description: So it begins ...

levels.description: If you tap too long, you will grab your block instead of rotating it

levels.name: Mirrors 2
levels.description: Fun fact: In Switzerland it is illegal to own just one guinea pig

levels.name: Mirrors 3
levels.description: Sometimes it's enough to simply step around

levels.name: Mirrors 4
levels.description: Cherophobia is the fear of fun

levels.name: Mirrors 5
levels.description: Mirrors can reflect the lasers on both sides

levels.name: Mirrors 6
levels.description: Remember your previous lesson, young padawan

levels.name: Mirrors 7
levels.description: The x makes the objects too heavy to lift or rotate

levels.name: Mirrors 8
levels.description: Hard work pays off

levels.name: T-Mirrors Intro
levels.description: T-Mirror stands for "Transparent Mirror", Duh!

levels.name: T-Mirrors 1
levels.description: Splitting up doesnt always mean that you lose something

levels.name: T-Mirrors 2
levels.description: Bob! Grab the fireworks!

levels.name: T-Mirrors 3
levels.description: A parrot and a hot air balloon go into bar ...

levels.name: Subtractive Intro
levels.description: Combining things is the essence of creation ... and fun too

levels.name: Subtractive 1
levels.description: Sometimes you don't need all the pictures to create your masterpiece

levels.name: Subtractive 2
levels.description: Oh the good old days, just like in art class!

levels.name: Subtractive 3
levels.description: In New York, it's illegal to sell a haunted house without telling the buyer

levels.name: Subtractive 4
levels.description: Give the poor dog his flower!

levels.name: Subtractive 5
levels.description: Fun fact: Blueberries will not ripen until they are picked

levels.name: Subtractive 6
levels.description: Seems obvious, doesn't it?

levels.name: Subtractive 7
levels.description: I see a blue dot and I want to paint it blaaack!

levels.name: Subtractive 8
levels.description: Now it's getting complicated

levels.name: Subtractive 9
levels.description: Try to think backwards!

levels.name: Subtractive 10
levels.description: Don't forget, you can zoom into the image, by holding your finger on them

levels.name: Subtractive 11
levels.description: The devil is in the detail

levels.name: Additive 11
levels.description: Birds and pans

levels.name: Additive 12
